TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
Non-bright lights burn your eyes.

The ability to run any program on any device (i. e. KSP on a Zune).

You can. But all programs get zuned.

Don't ask me what's that. It's too terrible even to explain.

 

A superpower to see the internal mechanics of processes.

You cannot see anything new with your superpower because it is too focused on seeing the whole universe, which you were already a part of. 

I would like my superpower to be the ability to move objects I touch with my mind. 

Like super strength and telekenesis combined.

You accidentally destroy yourself.

 

I want to destroy the entirety of Japan.

You are queued after Godzilla, Kaiju, Titans, and a hundred of noname destroyers.

A superpower to rewind dull movies on TV.
(Fixed: no more watching TV for years,)

You can't stop it.

To scatter myself into atoms and control every single particle of my body separately.

You’d be a fancy cloud of very fine dust.

To make Netflix stop producing content

You now have the power to make netflix stop producing original content. Now they just make souless cash-grabs.

I want the power to attach a basic energy card from my deck to any of my benched pokemon once per turn.

Hm, I still annihilate them with a dusk mane Necrosma.

I want the power to toast toast with my hands.

You toast anybody you touch, and running water doesn't help you.

I wish to absorb any and all types of radiation and store and release said radiation with no ill-effects or limits. Nothing blinds me, I can see and process anything, nothing can overload my body's capacity for radiation, the radiation doesn't cause cancer.

Tumors develop through a different process.

the power to create a shockwave along the ground.

A minefield appears wherever you go. Once a wrong step - and you will.

A superpower to save 3d models to files right from the mind.

You don't have an I/O port to get the file out of your mind.

Full comprehension of memory allocation.

For now memory allocation costs at least millions? so that's impossible.

The power of summoning kraken, even in a game-based anime (I've 'abused' this as much as air raid sirens earlier in this forum).

you have the power to summon krakens anywhere, but only after a seven hour long ritual involving VR headets and car sized air raid sirens

I want the power to cook dark meat and white meat at the same temperature without drying out the meat.

Edited December 15, 2018 by roboslacker

Granted.

I've bought you this. And a pair of earmuffs and earplugs. And a vehicle and life insurance.

I wish a power to summon cthulhu and Kraken simultaneously, at the same location as my last post.

Cthulhu model is so complicated that Kraken makes you restart every time.

 

3 hours ago, roboslacker said:

I want the power to cook dark meat and white meat at the same temperature without drying out the meat.﻿

You are now on a raw food diet. Any meat is wet and has the room temperature.

***

A superpower to turn Pepsi into Coca and vise versa.

you can but it turns flat and room temperature whenever you use it 

I wish to roll a natural 20 whenever I want

16 minutes ago, lapis said:

you can but it turns flat and room temperature whenever you use it 

I wish to roll a natural 20 whenever I want

A large block of stone appears in the shape of a 20 and rolls over you

I wish to fly for 1 second, 1 m above the ground

you start floating for on second one meter off the ground but then you are hurled at the sun at 99999999m/s

 

I want pancakes to appear in front of me whenever I want to

You gain the ability to transform your arm into a heated griddle and regurgitate pancake batter onto it.

I want the power to reload my secondary weapon 20% faster.

1 hour ago, roboslacker said:

You gain the ability to transform your arm into a heated griddle and regurgitate pancake batter onto it.

I want the power to reload my secondary weapon 20% faster.

Reloading that fast causes it to jam completely

I wish to have a superpower, that does nothing, but can still be passed from 1 person to another.

[props if you get that]

You have your power, but nobody gives you super strength.

I want the power to generate a random number between 1 and 1000 in my mind.

granted but every time you use it it comes out as 1001

I wish to be able to play my music as loud as I want to in public without anyone getting annoyed

you get annoyed by the music you play.

I want to change the speed of light at will, but keep relativity intact.
